page.title: 13Religion
page.content: This area has many Welsh {Nonconformist}Chapels. The oldest chapel is{Bethlehem Congregationalist in Cadle,it was established in 1840 and it began in the front room of a house.{St.Peters Church}in Cockett, when it was established,had the largest parish in Swansea,taking in the whole of Fforestfach,Waunarlwydd and Penlan areas.In 1980 it was split into two parishes with the creation of the parish of{St.Teilo's Church}in Caerithin. The area is also served by a Catholic Church in Gendros called Our Lady Queen of the Universe,and also by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints in Cockett. In a survey conducted by us,only 16% are regular church goers.
